language.welcomeIntro: Welcome to the ZyTrust Fingerprint Driver Setup program. This program will install the ZyTrust Fingerprint Driver on your computer.
language.eulaHeaderTitle: Review the terms of the license agreement
language.eulaNoButton: I do not accept this agreement
language.installHeaderTitle: Please wait while Setup finishes installing the driver.
language.finishText: Setup has finished installing the ZyTrust Fingerprint driver.
